title: A comprehensive pre-treatment strategy evaluation of ligno-hemicellulosic biomass to enhance biogas potential in the anaerobic digestion process
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, 2,2444-2467
DOI: 10.1039/D4SU00099D, Critical Review
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Rajesh Kumar Prasad, Anjali Sharma, Pranab Behari Mazumder, Anil Dhussa
Effective pretreatment of ligno-hemicellulosic biomass has emerged as a pre-requisite for its efficient conversion into biogas through the anaerobic digestion (AD) process.
